setDrawClearButton

public void setDrawClearButton(Button button)
Let's you pass in a reference to a button that you want to use to clear the graphics layer used for drawing. MyTouchListener will toggle it on via setEnabled(true) when the user draws something.

IMPORTANT: If you don't do this you'll get a nullPointerException.

Parameters:
button -
See Also:
clearDrawGraphicsLayer

clearDrawGraphicsLayer

public void clearDrawGraphicsLayer()
Clears all drawing graphics.
